vehicles.description: Several cars are visible on the left side waiting; their orientation suggests they could be in a parked position or waiting to merge into traffic.
vehicles.explanation: The ego car should monitor these vehicles for any sudden movements or merging actions.

vehicles.description: Red car directly in front of the ego car with brake lights on
vehicles.explanation: This indicates that the red car is either slowing down or has come to a stop, which will require the ego car to maintain a safe following distance and prepare to stop or slow down as well.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A group of pedestrians about to cross the road, on the right side of the ego vehicle, at the designated pedestrian crossing.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The ego vehicle should prepare to yield to the pedestrians as they have right of way in the pedestrian crossing zone.

other objects.description: A barrier on the right side of the road, indicating a boundary area.
other objects.explanation: This barrier limits the usable width of the road and the ego car should remain in its lane away from the barrier.

suggestions: The ego car should maintain a safe distance from the red car in front, be prepared to stop for the pedestrians, and monitor the surrounding vehicles, especially the white SUV and black sedan, for any sudden movements. Since we can't see the state of the traffic lights, the ego car must also prepare for possible traffic light changes.
